packets.name: Encoded Command
packets.description: Wrapper packet for encoded commands (0xD7 subpackets). Used for house design, abilities, guild/quest requests.

subpackets.name: Clear Floor
subpackets.description: Clear a floor in house design

packets.name: House Design: Backup
packets.description: Client requests to backup current house design state.

packets.name: House Design: Restore
packets.description: Client requests to restore house design from backup.

packets.name: House Design: Commit
packets.description: Client commits the current house design changes.

packets.name: House Design: Delete Component
packets.description: Client requests to delete a component from house design.

packets.name: House Design: Build Component
packets.description: Client requests to place a component in house design.

packets.name: House Design: Close Tool
packets.description: Client closes the house design tool.

packets.name: House Design: Add Stairs
packets.description: Client requests to add stairs to house design.

packets.name: House Design: Sync Request
packets.description: Client requests to synchronize house design state.

packets.name: House Design: Clear Floor
packets.description: Client requests to clear a floor in house design.

packets.name: House Design: Change Floor Level
packets.description: Client changes the visible floor level in house design.

packets.name: House Design: Add Roof
packets.description: Client requests to add a roof tile (Samurai Empire+).

packets.name: House Design: Delete Roof
packets.description: Client requests to delete a roof tile (Samurai Empire+).

fields.name: Z
fields.description: Z offset of roof to delete

packets.name: Set Weapon Ability
packets.description: Client selects a weapon special ability.

packets.name: House Design: Revert
packets.description: Client requests to revert house design to original state.

packets.name: Guild Gump Request
packets.description: Client requests to open the guild gump.

packets.name: Quest Gump Request
packets.description: Client requests to open the quest/MLB gump.
